name: Aternos Golden Theme
description:
This theme is created for the free minecraft hosting website Aternos. I originally created this theme for my own, but others wanted it too, so i recoded the whole thing to remove some bugs that came along with the old one. Feel free to use it and i hope you like it.

*If you find any bugs, pls let me know in discord!*

Discord: ScreeZ #9976
